unnormalised: Arre yaar, hea paneer butter masala recipeak 250 gms paneer zai mhunnta. Konn paneer tolta? Aandazak ghe re, bhai! Ani 1 tsp garam masala mhunnta? Hanv sodanch, sumar 2 dhaaltaa. Thoddem zhaanzhaale zata. Mhoji dadi-chi recipe sodanch "chimut bh么r" va "mut't bh么r" ashi measurements vapartaali, hea modern recipes portun thorli. Ani taka 100 ml cream zai, zaitech mhonnlear ek chot'to packet.
normalised: Arre yaar, hea paneer butter masala recipe-ak donso panchvis gram paneer zai mhonta. Konn paneer vajan korta? Fakot andazan ghe, bhai! Ani ek chammach garam masala mhunta? Hanv sodanch don martam, mhantlear. Bareak zhal-lai pikant. Mhoje dadi-chea recipe-nt "chimut bhorti" vo "mut'thi bhorti" vapartale, te hea novea recipe-am poros kiteakui borem, tuka khobor asa? Ani taka ekso milliliter cream zai, mhantlear adheacho lhan packet.
text: Arre yaar, hea paneer butter masala recipeak 250 gms paneer zai mhunnta. Konn paneer tolta? Aandazak ghe re, bhai! Ani 1 tsp garam masala mhunnta? Hanv sodanch, sumar 2 dhaaltaa. Thoddem zhaanzhaale zata. Mhoji dadi-chi recipe sodanch "chimut bh么r" va "mut't bh么r" ashi measurements vapartaali, hea modern recipes portun thorli. Ani taka 100 ml cream zai, zaitech mhonnlear ek chot'to packet.
